casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 14, 2010

[Cite as 0411412010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-1557]

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

2009-2165. State ex rel. Pollock v. Lillian & Betty Ratner School, Inc.

In Mandamus. Motion for leave to amend complaint and relator’s affidavit granted. Motion to dismiss granted. Motion for sanctions for frivolous action denied. Cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
